title: Following Industries may be permitted with power requirement not more than 10 H
clause_text: Following Industries may be permitted with power requirement not more than 10 H.P., employment not more than 9 persons and floor area not exceeding 100 sq.m. Manufacture of milk and dairy products such as butter, ghee, etc.; Manufacture of bakery products with no Floor above; Manufacture of bidi ( May be permitted in R-1 Zone also); Handloom / power-loom of yarn for a maximum of 4 looms; Manufacture of all types of textile garments including wearing apparel;
section: Uses Permitted in Independent Premises / Buildings

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Following Industries may be permitted with power requirement not more than 10 H.P., employment not more than 9 persons and floor area not exceeding 100 sq.m.
